thread.section_title: Poseidon Expeditions Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Poseidon Expeditions | poseidonexpeditions.com
thread.title: Brandes

author: Brandes
title: Brandes
text: Accommodations were lovely. Food was plentiful and delicious. Crew was very friendly and helpful. Captain and expedition leader worked hard to make sure we had many landings and experiences. Very reasonable policy regarding bringing liquor on board. A few glitches here and there, with team leaders learning to work as a team, and I would have liked to have my window cleaned properly, but all in all they did an excellent job and I definitely recommend the company. My travel agent said the Sea Spirit was a nicer ship for the money than most ships that size.
